channel.title: Dancing in the Fire of Transformation
channel.description: In this lively interview series, Yogi Sean reveals that personal transformation is not based upon changing conditions or upon circumstances in your life; it's based upon changing who you are as you approach life.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Adventures in the Living Bardo
channel.itunes:summary: A fascinating exploration into how to create and develop a personal relationship with Divine Presence. It is through this relationship that you can be transformed and Self-Express with your own innate divinity, your Divine Heritage.
channel.itunes:keywords: spirituality, personal transformation, spiritual practice, meditation, tonglen, loving-kindness, buddhism, bardo, reincarnation, vedas, upanishads, vivekananda, Ghandi, rimpoche, divine, love, god, bhakti, healing, happiness, bliss
channel.itunes:author: Yogi Sean

image.title: Dancing in the Fire of Transformation

item.title: Who Really Suffers?
item.description: In this program, Yogi Sean talks about the false sense of self and its identification with suffering. He asks, "What part of me suffers and sees circumstances as I do?"

item.title: Change is Wild & Without Propriety
item.description: In this segment, Yogi Sean explores how to work wisely with the sometimes chaotic process of change and transformation. This process need not be destructive; with a guiding direction for your life, transformation can manifest powerful, new and positive circumstances.
item.author: yogisean@personaltransformationradio.com
item.category: Society: Religion and Spirituality: Buddhism: Lineages: Tibetan
item.itunes:subtitle: Adventures in the Living Bardo

item.description: In this program, Yogi Sean reveals that as we transform our habits of perception, we will cultivate a real and personal relationship with God. We will not only see God, we can become a Co-Creative Self-Expression of the Divine.
